ModMetaData.name: Cerebrex Node Rebalance
ModMetaData.author: Antigravity
ModMetaData.description:
Rebalances the Cerebrex Node to be a true endgame reward.
Features: - Increases Mechanoid Bandwidth to +30 - Increases Mechanoid Work Speed to +50% - Adds "Request Mechanoid Supply Drop" ability - Subjugating the mech hive neutralizes the Mechanoid faction
